ratapura pihita athi singar alewisal 370 kin dayalog tiwi bilpath gewime pahasuwa athi karamin pasugiyada dayalog saha singar samagam giwisumakata elambaini.dayalog telikom samagame samuha pradhana widhayaka niladhari aacharya hans wijayasuriya saha singar shri laka samagame sabhapathi hemaka amarasuriya adala giwisuma huwamaru karaganna ayuru.dayalog tiwi hi pradhana meheyum niladhari suren gunawardhana, pradhana widhayaka niladhari nushad perera, singar shri lanka samagame mulya adhyaksha pi්rayath salgadu saha dayalog tiwi hi samagam alewi anshaye kalamanakaruwaku wana resa anif mahathwaru da mehi wethi.mahabanku adhipathi ajith niwad kabral mahatha polthel pahana dalwa shri lanka bankukaruwange aayathanaye 14 wani sammana saha sahathika pradanothsawaya aarambha kala awasthawa.
suhada hadak athi deshiya bankuwa lesa, anagathayedi rate sabama sampath bawata pathwana me daru parapura dirimath kirima apage yuthukamak bawayi gamika da silwa mahatha awadharanaya kale.
